title: FS/FT: T207 Charlie Hall Anonymous back - SOLD
author: Thromdog

posts.post_title: FS/FT: T207 Charlie Hall Anonymous back - SOLD
posts.post_content:
CARD IS SOLD

Kind of an oddity, and don't really have a price for him, hoping someone can help me out.

T207 of Charlie Hall with an Anonymous back. It's obviously in poor condition but also obviously an Anonymous back (Louisiana can be made out so it's a fact 3)

I don't see many Recruit class anonymous back to compare to for price. So shoot me a PM if interested and maybe we can work something out.

Will consider trades also, prewar tobacco and caramel. 

Thanks for looking!
Jeff
